text: Cryptophagus scanicus is a species of silken fungus beetle native to Europe.Fauna EuropaeaJohnson, C.1992 Familie: Cryptophagidae. In: Die Käfer Mitteleuropas, vol.2 Goecke and Evers. title: Cryptophagus scanicus
